descriptionHtml:
The first in what will probably be a series of cosmetic tweaks for various companions. Tweaks, being the key word. The goal is better looking characters that still maintain the essence of their design. This one stars everybody\'s favorite werewolf, Aela the Huntress.

Changes include:

Hair color: Aela\'s now a true ginger! Using the inkdropper tool in my drawing/photoediting program of choice, I copied the color of real redheads and applied it to Aela. Now, depending on your graphics settings/mods this hair color may appear either washed out or hypersaturated. Based on comments, I may upload alternate versions.

Eye color: Changed to hazel, to tie together with a the gold/amber eyes of werewolves in Skyrim.

Facial features: Very small tweaks; corrected Aela\'s slight overbite, and narrowed her chin just a tad to make her look a little less masculine.

INSTALLATION: Just plop the .esp directly into your data folder in the Skyrim directory, make sure the mod is checked in your launcher data files, and you\'re good to go!

And that\'s it! Face paint, freckles, all of that good stuff intact! Enjoy!
author: Dirk
